body.section: Hierarchy VictimOfIntimatePartnerOrDomesticViolence is a kind of VictimOfAbuseOrNeglectRecord

section.title: Description
section.p: This specialization class is used to specify the codes and details related to a history of violence perpetrated by a domestic partner.

stentry.p: This attribute specifies the type of victim or abuse or neglect using a standard coding system.
